long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Memebreak aims to give you much needed breaks in lengthy computer sessions with memes which open up in a new window after a specified time! However, we do respect important meetings and have implemented a system to delay a meme by up to an hour because a meeting longer than that isn't worth going to without memes! The autoscroll feature automatically scrolls memes for you after every 20 seconds. There is even a 'Next' button with which you can manually scroll or skip a meme. The memes are sourced from 60+ subreddits across Reddit and are filtered to exclude any Not Safe For Work (NSFW) posts. We can't wait to see you get lost in a never ending world of instant gratification!

How to use?
- Add the extension to Google Chrome.
- Click on the extension icon.
- Set the timer using the slider.
- Once set, click 'Done'.
- Get back to work, a new chrome window will pop-up in the selected time with memes!
